name: Anino
description:
Play as Ilaw (Tagalog for Light) and his Anino (Tagalog for Shadow). Together join forces to solve puzzles in this short platformer game.

Contains only 1 level.  Created using Phaser.js

Entry to the GMTK Game Jame 2021

Controls: 

  • Arrow Left & Right - Move sideways
  • Space, Arrow Up - Jump
  • Z - Change Mode  - Toggle control mode (Linked or Unlinked). Can only Link when players are aligned , on the floor and not moving. 
  • X - Pass Control - Available when Unlinked Mode. Toggle between Ilaw or Anino.
  • R - Restart Level

Modes: 

  • Linked - Ilaw and Anino moves together. Has higher jump.
  • Unlinked - Control either Ilaw or Anino. Regular jump.

Mode Indicator:

  • Chain is  white - Linked mode
  • Chain different color - Unlinked mode. White part indicates who you are controlling.
  • Chain glowing - Players aligned and can be linked

Assets used here are not mine but were sourced from the ff.

Notes:

  • This is actually the first game I made (excluding those made with a tutorial) so forgive the clunkiness haha.
  • Does not automatically reset when player is trapped. Manually press R to restart.
  • Bugs in collision
  • Resource heavy. Will need to do optimizations. If having issues try using Chrome or Edge Chromium and close other windows.
